author: kpedro88
body:
This PR reverts the 2017 HE back to the Phase0 model (HPDs w/ 2-3 depth segmentations). It supersedes #17052. It was developed on top of `CMSSW_9_0_X_2017-01-15-2300`.

856a5b08697fec72112a7e9ec5ec2bc6b05b4336 applies several TEMPORARY changes to make the 2017 workflow continue to run:
* customise function to use hardcode conditions for HCAL and skip packing/unpacking (due to lack of appropriate conditions for this geometry, including emap)
* use of XML geometry instead of database (updated 2017 geom not yet in DB tag)

Other notable changes in this PR:
* HBHEPhase1Reconstructor will still be used for 2017, even though we only plan to have HPDs - better/more maintainable code, already validated in DPG
* The "TestNumbering" setting is now enabled for 2017 onward - this allows the reuse of GEN-SIM when HB or HE topology (=depth segmentation) is changed, by storing SimHits per-layer instead of per-depth
* 2018 workflow introduced to keep the Phase1 HE alive for local HCAL studies (didn't bother to duplicate all the extra cosmic/tracker/etc. workflow variations, they can be added if someone needs them)

My intention is that @ianna and @abdoulline + AlCa contacts will make new tags for changed HCAL conditions and geometry records (for *both* 2017 and 2018 = clone of current 2017), and then I can update `autoCond.py` in this PR for final tests. Therefore, I will put the PR on hold once submitted so it will not be merged without these necessary pieces.

This PR will be backported to 81X, but #16874 needs to be merged first or HCAL validation will not be able to handle the TestNumbering SimHits.
title: Phase0 HE in 2017, Phase1 HE in 2018
